members.name: collapseFocused
members.description: collapses the focused element. If it is closed the parent will be focused.

members.name: expandFocused
members.description: expands the focused node, if it is opened the first child will be focused

members.name: expandFocusedRecursive
members.description: expands the focused node recursive

members.name: collapseFocusedRecursive
members.description: collapses the focused node recursive

members.name: selectFocused
members.description: selects the focused element.

members.name: search
members.description: Search in the visible nodes

members.name: focusParent
members.description:
Focuses the parent tree node without selecting it.

The tree item will also scrollIntoViewIfNeeded() (on all platforms which support this method).

members.name: focusPrevious
members.description:
focus the previous visible node.

The tree item will also scrollIntoViewIfNeeded() (on all platforms which support this method).

members.name: locationIn
members.description: Inject a location object, which contains a query param property to select the current node.

members.name: selectPrev
members.description: select the previous visible item

members.name: expandNodeRecursive
members.description: expands the currently selected node recursive

members.name: collapseNodeRecursive
members.description: expands the currently selected node recursive

members.name: toggle
members.description: toggles the currently selected node

members.name: selectNext
members.description: select the next visible item

members.name: focusFirst
members.description:
Focuses the first node in the tree without selecting it.

Use selectFocused to select the focused node.

The tree item will also scrollIntoViewIfNeeded() (on all platforms which support this method).

members.name: focusLast
members.description:
Focuses the last node in the tree without selecting it.

Use selectFocused to select the focused node.

The tree item will also scrollIntoViewIfNeeded() (on all platforms which support this method).

members.name: focusNext
members.description:
focuses the next visible tree node.

The tree item will also scrollIntoViewIfNeeded() (on all platforms which support this method).

members.name: focus
members.description: focuses the tree itself. You can use this in combination with keyboard navigation (furo-navigation-pad)

members.name: _FBPReady
members.description: flow is ready lifecycle method

members.name: bindData
members.description:
Binds a FieldNode with a tree signature.

A sample and usable signature can be found in ./specs/

members.name: focusSelected
members.description:
Focuses the currently selected tree item.

The tree item will also scrollIntoViewIfNeeded() (on all platforms which support this method).

members.name: _flatTree
members.description: Flat list representation of the tree

members.name: tabindex
members.description: Sets the tabindex

members.name: expandDepth
members.description:
Sets the maximal expand level relative from the current node.

Expanding is a expensive operation.

members.name: _searchIsActive
members.description: indicator for searching. Maybe you want style your item depending on this attribute

members.name: _tic
members.description:
If you want to use a custom component for the tree-item, set this attribute.
The default item component is **furo-ui5-tree-item**.

members.name: depth
members.description: Maximal depth for the tree. Default is infinite.

members.name: qp
members.description:
Query param to watch. If you set this attribute, the node-selected event will only be fired on `ƒ-qp-in` or `ƒ-select-by-id`.
If you select an item the `qp-change-request` will be fired.

members.name: rootAsHeader
members.description: Set this flag if you do not want a header-text section.

members.name: hideRootNode
members.description: Set this flag if you do not want to see the root node

members.name: headerText
members.description: Override display name from root object

members.name: secondaryText
members.description: Override description from root object.

members.name: nobgonhead
members.description:
disables the background color on focus, selected, ... on header node

Works only with `root-as-header` enabled

members.name: focused
members.description: indicates that the element is focused

events.description: Fired when the item gets selected, does not fire when you work with query params
events.name: node-selected

events.description: Fired when qp mode is enabled. Nodes are only selectable with qpIn or selectById
events.name: qp-change-requested

events.description: Fired when a node is opened
events.name: node-opened

events.description: Fired when a node is closed
events.name: node-closed

events.description: Fired when nodes are expanded recursive
events.name: nodes-expanded

events.description: Fired when nodes are collapsed recursive.
events.name: nodes-collapsed

attributes.name: depth
attributes.description: Maximal depth for the tree. Default is infinite.

attributes.name: expand-depth
attributes.description:
Sets the maximal expand level relative from the current node.

Expanding is a expensive operation.

attributes.name: qp
attributes.description:
Query param to watch. If you set this attribute, the node-selected event will only be fired on `ƒ-qp-in` or `ƒ-select-by-id`.
If you select an item the `qp-change-request` will be fired.

attributes.name: root-as-header
attributes.description: Set this flag if you do not want a header-text section.

attributes.name: hide-root-node
attributes.description: Set this flag if you do not want to see the root node

attributes.name: header-text
attributes.description: Override display name from root object

attributes.name: searching
attributes.description: indicator for searching. Maybe you want style your item depending on this attribute

attributes.name: no-bg-on-header
attributes.description:
disables the background color on focus, selected, ... on header node

Works only with `root-as-header` enabled

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description: indicates that the element is focused
